description: Delete an equipment movement stop requirement.
permissions: Requires permission to delete the stop requirement through the related equipment movement stop (delegated via equipment movement stop requirement policy).
side_effects: Deletes the equipment movement stop requirement and may update the related customer cost allocation. When related job production plans are confirmed, notifications about stop changes may be scheduled.
validation_notes: Requires <id> argument and --confirm. Deletion is blocked when related to a confirmed job production plan.
